title: Kate Middleton stuns in teal green, here's where you can copy her look for less
text:
Get the biggest Royal Family stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

The Duchess of Cambridge stepped out today for a special event at the Aga Khan centre, an event hosted to showcase modern Pakistani culture.

To mark the occasion Kate opted for an elegant teal gown to meet with Aga Khan himself, in preparation for the Duke and Duchess's official visit to Pakistan which starts on the 14th October.

Kate's ankle length dress, which cinches in at the waist with a matching sash belt, is from ARoss Girl x Soler and is available to buy here on Net-A-Porter.

The gorgeous frock is currently 30% off down to £577 from it's original £825.

Kate paired her dress with dark green suede stilettos and a matching clutch bag, which accentuated the shade of the gown perfectly.

In honour of the event, The Duchess also wore earrings by Pakistani designer Zeen .

(Image: PA)

A close up of the earrings shows us Kate has gone full green tonal, as they are set off with green and clear gems.

(Image: PA)

We are loving Kate's teal look, and if you are too, here's a round up of the best teal dresses on the high street...

Ghost Mindy Satin Dress in Teal

(Image: John Lewis)

This Ghost dress is almost identical!

Buy it here...

Dress, £145, Ghost at John Lewis

Teal Satin Pleated Midi Dress

(Image: New Look)

This New Look bargain feature on trend pleats

Buy it here...

Dress, £27.99, New Look

Teal Twist Maxi Dress

(Image: Wallis)

This maxi dress is perfect for weddings, and the twisted top makes it super flattering on larger busts

Buy it here...

Dress, £45, Wallis

Happy shopping!
description: The Duchess of Sussex was seen in a gorgeous teal green dress today, here's where you can get the look...
